text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c95940c06a125d3afe6516f11f8b2f5697a6b3b9|patch 8.2.1871: using %v in 'errorformat' may fail before %Z>
patch 8.2.1871: using %v in 'errorformat' may fail before %Z

Problem:    Using %v in 'errorformat' may fail before %Z.
Solution:   Set qf_viscol only when qf_col is set. (closes #7169)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1871: using %v in 'errorformat' may fail before %Z · vim/vim@c95940c
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1871: using %v in 'errorformat' may fail before %Z · vim/vim@c95940c
attachments.text: Problem: Using %v in 'errorformat' may fail before %Z. Solution: Set qf_viscol only when qf_col is set. (closes #7169)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/39ca4127a094d8aca6f77c01be4f3fea506d5cb7|patch 8.2.1870: Vim9: no need to keep all script variables>
patch 8.2.1870: Vim9: no need to keep all script variables

Problem:    Vim9: no need to keep all script variables.
Solution:   Only keep script variables when a function was defined that could
            use them.  Fix freeing static string on exit.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1870: Vim9: no need to keep all script variables · vim/vim@39ca412
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1870: Vim9: no need to keep all script variables · vim/vim@39ca412
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: no need to keep all script variables. Solution: Only keep script variables when a function was defined that could use them. Fix freeing static string on exit.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/955347cc7e78352a5d49540573ae958ad45e6386|patch 8.2.1869: Vim9: memory leak when using add()>
patch 8.2.1869: Vim9: memory leak when using add()

Problem:    Vim9: memory leak when using add().
Solution:   Free the added item.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1869: Vim9: memory leak when using add() · vim/vim@955347c
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1869: Vim9: memory leak when using add() · vim/vim@955347c
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: memory leak when using add(). Solution: Free the added item.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/9a13e185e5de95b150555134b34030bd47c4e22b|patch 8.2.1868: Vim9: no error for missing space after comma in dict>
patch 8.2.1868: Vim9: no error for missing space after comma in dict

Problem:    Vim9: no error for missing space after comma in dict.
Solution:   Check for white space. (closes #6672)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1868: Vim9: no error for missing space after comma in dict · vim/vim@9a13e18
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1868: Vim9: no error for missing space after comma in dict · vim/vim@9a13e18
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: no error for missing space after comma in dict. Solution: Check for white space. (closes #6672)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/80b0e5ea1132d1d7cf78c77bc14c686c836a0d25|patch 8.2.1867: Vim9: argument to add() not checked for blob>
patch 8.2.1867: Vim9: argument to add() not checked for blob

Problem:    Vim9: argument to add() not checked for blob.
Solution:   Add the BLOBAPPEND instruction.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1867: Vim9: argument to add() not checked for blob · vim/vim@80b0e5e
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1867: Vim9: argument to add() not checked for blob · vim/vim@80b0e5e
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: argument to add() not checked for blob. Solution: Add the BLOBAPPEND instruction.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/66fa5fd54f550c0790d36c20124c49493b323bfa|patch 8.2.1866: Vim9: appending to pushed blob gives wrong result>
patch 8.2.1866: Vim9: appending to pushed blob gives wrong result

Problem:    Vim9: appending to pushed blob gives wrong result.
Solution:   Set ga_maxlen when copying a blob.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1866: Vim9: appending to pushed blob gives wrong result · vim/vim@66fa5fd
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1866: Vim9: appending to pushed blob gives wrong result · vim/vim@66fa5fd
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: appending to pushed blob gives wrong result. Solution: Set ga_maxlen when copying a blob.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/1dcae59957301b6b19aef49af648715f911a1378|patch 8.2.1865: Vim9: add() does not check type of argument>
patch 8.2.1865: Vim9: add() does not check type of argument

Problem:    Vim9: add() does not check type of argument.
Solution:   Inline the add() call. (closes #7160)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1865: Vim9: add() does not check type of argument · vim/vim@1dcae59
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1865: Vim9: add() does not check type of argument · vim/vim@1dcae59
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: add() does not check type of argument. Solution: Inline the add() call. (closes #7160)
